testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to update coupon information with the specified ID number via the API connection.
testcase.name: When a PATCH request body containing invalid authorization information, along with the coupon ID to be updated and necessary data

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/coupon/couponUpdate/72" path parameters............passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing the "newUpdate_Coupon" "project_added_id" 007 "2028-08-28" "2024-03-30" 10 5 1 30 1 1 data to send to the api coupon couponUpdate endpoint..passed * The api user records the response from the api coupon couponUpdate endpoint, verifying that the status code is '401' and the reason phrase is Unauthenticated..undefined
